mapper.sql: select project_no,title,id,content,point,progressing,achieve,hit, to_char(project_date,'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') as project_date,progressing_end_date from project_write
mapper.select: select subject,subject_man as mans from project_depart where project_no=#{value}
mapper.insert:
select project_seq.nextval from dual
insert into project_write(project_no,title,id,content,achieve,point,project_date,progressing_end_date) values(#{projectNo},#{projectName},#{id},#{content},#{achieve},#{point},sysdate,#{deadline})
mapper.update: update project_depart set subject=#{subject},subject_man=#{mans} where project_no=#{projectNo} and subject=#{subject}
update Project_write set hit=hit+1 where project_no=#{value}
mapper.insert:
select project_comment_seq.nextval from dual
insert into project_comment( project_comment_no,project_no,id,content,type,project_comment_date) values(#{commentNo},#{boardNo},#{id},#{content},2,sysdate)
mapper.select: select project_comment_no as commentNo,id,content,to_char(project_comment_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') as commentDate from project_comment where project_no=#{value} and type=2 order by project_no desc
select project_comment_no as commentNo,id,content,to_char(project_comment_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') as commentDate from project_comment where project_comment_no=#{value} and type=2
mapper.insert:
select project_comment_seq.nextval from dual
insert into project_comment( project_comment_no,project_no,id,content,type,project_comment_date,project_sub) values(#{commentNo},#{boardNo},#{id},#{content},1,sysdate,#{projectSub})
mapper.update: update project_comment set content=#{content} where project_comment_no=#{commentNo}
mapper.select: where id=#{value} and achieve='모집중' order by project_date desc

select p.title,p.progressing,p.point,p.project_no,to_char(c.project_comment_date,'YY-MM-DD') as deadline,c.project_comment_no as hit from project_comment c,project_write p where c.type=1 and c.id=#{value} and c.project_no=p.project_no order by deadline desc

select distinct p.id,p.title,p.achieve,p.progressing,p.point,p.project_no,to_char(p.project_date,'YY.MM.DD') as project_date from project_comment c,project_write p where c.type!=2 and p.achieve='진행중' and (p.id=#{value} or c.id=#{value}) order by project_date desc

select distinct p.id,p.title,p.achieve,p.progressing,p.point,p.project_no,to_char(p.project_date,'YY.MM.DD') as project_date from project_comment c,project_write p where c.type!=2 and p.achieve='완료' and (p.id=#{value} or c.id=#{value}) order by project_date desc
select project_comment_no as commentNo, project_no as boardNo,id,content,project_comment_date as commentDate from project_comment where project_no=#{boardNo} and id=#{id} and type=1
mapper.update: update project_write set achieve='진행중' where project_no=#{value}
mapper.select: select p.project_no,c.id,c.content,to_char(p.project_date,'YY.MM.DD') as commentDate,c.project_sub as projectSub from project_write p,project_comment c where p.project_no=c.project_no and p.achieve='모집중' and c.type=1 and p.project_no=#{value} order by commentDate desc
mapper.delete: delete from project_comment where id=#{id} and project_no=#{boardNo} and type=1
mapper.update: update project_write set project_date=sysdate, achieve='완료' where project_no=#{value}
update project_write set progressing=#{progressing} where project_no=#{projectNo}
